Class ArrowDispenser

  • java.lang.Object
    • platform.game.Actor

        • platform.game.weapon.ArrowDispenser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Actor>

    public class ArrowDispenser
extends Block
    Block that throw an arrow each x seconds.
